mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "For Square Dancers Who Travel", "Square Dance Tour Guide, 1985", "Travel Beckons You", "Where Are They Now?", "Whatever Became of Joe Lewis?", "Forty Years of American Squares Magazine", "It All Started As A Hobby", "Recognition: The President and Paul Hartman", "Quarterly Movement Report", "34th National Convention" and "Square Dance Date Book." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "The Changing Scene", "Advanced Dancing", "Mostly Modular", "Contra Corner", "Experimental Notes", "On the Record", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundance Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "StyleLab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month" and "Current Releases."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
